DOC.brief_title: Longitudinal Evaluation Women Undergoing Pelvic Exenteration Treatment Gynecologic Malignancy
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective Study Procedures : Study Procedures : If agree take part study , ask complete series questionnaire specific time . The questionnaire ask question feel , able , depression , cop , social support , sexual function , body image . There 11 questionnaire total , filled day . You complete questionnaire follow time : - You complete 7 questionnaire surgery . They take 40 minute complete . - You complete 4 questionnaire 4-6 week surgery . They take 25 minute complete . - You complete 8 questionnaire 6 month surgery . They take 45 minute complete . - You complete 8 questionnaire 1 , 2 , 5 10 year surgery . They take 50 minute complete time . - You complete 2 questionnaire 3 4 year surgery . They take 10 minute complete time . - If cervical cancer , ask complete 1 additional questionnaire visit . If follow MD Anderson , fill questionnaires follow-up visit . If time fill questionnaires visit follow another hospital may return questionnaire mail pre-stamped envelope send questionnaire . These questionnaire may also answer phone . If complete surgery , information complication and/or problem may experience first 60 day surgery , standard follow visit every 3 month first 2 year every 6 month next 3 year collect medical record . Length Study : If unable surgery , take study . If able complete surgery , remain study 10 year surgery . This investigational study . Up 200 patient take part study . Up 199 enrol MD Anderson . Retrospective Study Procedures : Study Procedures : If agree take part study , ask complete series questionnaire . There 11 questionnaire total , type number questionnaire depend long surgery enroll study cervical gynecological cancer . The questionnaire ask question feel , able , depression , cop , social support , sexual function , body image . If follow MD Anderson , fill questionnaires follow-up visit . If time fill questionnaires visit follow another hospital may return questionnaire mail pre-stamped envelope send questionnaire . These questionnaire may also answer phone . Information complication and/or problem may experience first 60 day surgery , standard follow visit every 3 month first 2 year every 6 month next 3 year collect medical record . Length Study : You remain study 10 year surgery . This investigational study . Up 200 patient take part study . Up 199 enrol MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women history gynecologic malignancy , include cervical , endometrial , vulvar , vaginal carcinoma histology . 2 . Women undergone pelvic exenteration January 1993 offer pelvic exenteration treatment gynecologic malignancy . 3 . Patients must suitable candidate fo surgery ( case prospective collection ) . 4 . Patients sign approve Informed Consent . 5 . Patients prior malignancy allow > 3 year previous current evidence disease . 6 . Females old 18 year . 7 . Women must able read write either Spanish English . 1 . Patients contraindication surgery . 2 . Patients unwilling unable complete selfadministered questionnaire . 3 . Patients read speak English Spanish .
